channel.title: Monster Drops
channel.description:
I want to make a monster drop an item, I know how to do that, but I want the drop rate to be .01 but it wont let me, it'll only let me do from 1%-100% drop rate, any idea how o make it .01%? heres the error...
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ppa7bd.jpg[/img]

item.title: Monster Drops

item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“yourusername, post:2, topic:329599”]unfortunately you can only make it as low as 1 so its a 1/100 chance of getting that item.[/quote]aww man, k thnx
